body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, welcome to Vincenzo's Benzos! My name is Gabriel Evans. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Gabriel, I'm Karen Alexander. I'm looking to buy a new car.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Karen! To help personalize our recommendations, could you tell me the model of car you're interested in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm interested in a sedan, preferably one with good fuel efficiency.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great choice! Sedans are very popular. Could you also let me know your budget range, spelled out, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, I'm looking at a range between two zero thousand and three five thousand dollars.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: That helps a lot, Karen. We have several models that match those criteria. Lastly, may I have your email address so I can send you more details?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Certainly, it's karen.a@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Karen. I'll send you a list of recommended cars along with some options for test drives. I appreciate your time today.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Gabriel! I look forward to your email.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're very welcome. Have a great day!

body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Gabriel Evans and the customer's name is Karen Alexander.  The conversation is about Vincenzo's Benzos (a Car Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.
